DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , randomized , control , open label study 50 subject metatarsus adductus ( MTA ) enrol . Subjects treated standard cast use UNFO-s device total time 20 week .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Universal Neonatal Foot Orthosis Treatment Metatarsus Adductus ( MTA )
DOC.criteria: Subjects acute MTA receive treatment condition Consenting parent Ages 14 month Participation another clinical trial . Neuromuscular disorder Any condition opinion investigator render subject ineligible study participation .
DOC.keyword: Metatarsus Adductus , also know Metatarsus Varus
